description: Security Group sg-0005c827ab5346707 allows inbound 0.0.0.0/0 on sensitive port 22.
remediation: Limit SSH/RDP to VPN/bastion or specific IPs; prefer SSM Session Manager.
reference: AWS Well-Architected: Security Pillar; CIS 4.1; AWS FSBP-EC2.SG.OpenIngress

description: Security Group allows egress to 0.0.0.0/0 on all ports (data exfiltration risk).
remediation: Constrain egress to required CIDRs/ports; use VPC endpoints and egress controls.
reference: AWS Well-Architected: Security Pillar; CIS 4.x; FSBP-EC2.SG.OpenEgress

description: Security Group allows egress to 0.0.0.0/0 on all ports (data exfiltration risk).
remediation: Constrain egress to required CIDRs/ports; use VPC endpoints and egress controls.
reference: AWS Well-Architected: Security Pillar; CIS 4.x; FSBP-EC2.SG.OpenEgress

description: Security Group allows egress to 0.0.0.0/0 on all ports (data exfiltration risk).
remediation: Constrain egress to required CIDRs/ports; use VPC endpoints and egress controls.
reference: AWS Well-Architected: Security Pillar; CIS 4.x; FSBP-EC2.SG.OpenEgress

description: S3 bucket is publicly accessible via ACL and/or bucket policy.
remediation: Block Public Access (account & bucket), remove public ACLs/policies, use presigned URLs/CloudFront with OAC.
reference: AWS FSBP-S3.1/2; CIS 2.1; WA Security Pillar

description: S3 bucket is publicly accessible via ACL and/or bucket policy.
remediation: Block Public Access (account & bucket), remove public ACLs/policies, use presigned URLs/CloudFront with OAC.
reference: AWS FSBP-S3.1/2; CIS 2.1; WA Security Pillar

description: IAM user 'audit-user-no-mfa' does not have MFA enabled.
remediation: Assign a virtual/hardware MFA device and enforce MFA via IAM policies.

description: Access key has never been used.
remediation: Remove unused keys; adopt least privilege and role-based access.

description: IAM user 'user-1' does not have MFA enabled.
remediation: Assign a virtual/hardware MFA device and enforce MFA via IAM policies.

description: No CloudTrail trail found (reduced forensic visibility).
remediation: Create an org or multi-region CloudTrail, log to S3 + CloudWatch Logs with SSE-KMS.
Enable EBS default encryption (prefer CMK) at the account/region level.
Modify instance metadata options to require IMDSv2.
Disable public access; place DB in private subnets with SG/VPC controls and use bastion/SSM.
